sections.text: In general. -- The budget, financial-accounting, personnel, payroll, procurement, and management information systems of the District of Columbia public schools shall be coordinated and interface with related systems of the District of Columbia Government.

Access. -- The Board of Education shall provide read-only access to its internal financial management systems and all other data bases to designated staff of the Mayor, the Council, the Authority, and appropriate congressional committees.

chapter.text: District of Columbia School Reform (Public Charter Schools).

subchapter.text: Management and Fiscal Accountability; Preservation of School-Based Resources.
